scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/matic.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ nyamwaya/athletex-dex-subgraph-mainnet subgraph.yaml --access-token
scripts.prepare:sportx: mustache config/sportx.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sportx.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:sportx: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://graph.sx.technology/ --ipfs https://ipfs.sx.technology/ sportstoken/athletex-dex --access-token
scripts.prepare:toronto: mustache config/toronto.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/toronto.json src/util/constants.template.ts > src/util/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:toronto: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://graph.toronto.sx.technology/ --ipfs https://ipfs.toronto.sx.technology/  sportstoken/athletex-dex --access-token
